mapper.select: select sid, editer, stitle, sstitle, to_char(sdate,'yyyy-mm-dd') sdate, shits, scontent, simage, ssimage from mg_board_story where sid=#{sid}

select rno, sid, editer, stitle, sstitle, sdate, shits, scontent, simage, ssimage from (select rownum rno, sid, editer, stitle, sstitle, to_char(sdate, 'yyyy-mm-dd') sdate, shits, scontent, simage, ssimage from (select sid, editer, stitle, sstitle, sdate, shits, scontent, simage, ssimage from mg_board_story order by sdate desc) )
